question: What are Hooks?
answers: Hooks are API with which you can directly use it in functional components
Hooks can be used in class components only
Hooks can be used in functional as well as class components
correct: Hooks are API with which you can directly use it in functional components

question: What are Pure Components
answers: Pure Components which have their own local state and doesnt re-render if same props or state changes
Pure components can share state between other components
Pure components are relative to each other
correct: Pure Components which have their own local state and doesnt re-render if same props or state changes
